title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with Angular frontend, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL database. Features include real-time inventory, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop boards, and team analytics. Built with Angular and Firebase.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Interactive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, animated charts, and PWA support for offline access.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Tool
description: Custom CI/CD pipeline visualization tool for monitoring builds, deployments, and infrastructure health across multiple environments.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio SPA built with Angular 19+, Tailwind CSS, and serverless backend. Features dark mode, animations, and SEO optimization.

title: API Gateway Service
description: Microservice API gateway with rate limiting, authentication, logging, and request routing. Built with Node.js and deployed on GCP.
